page_titles.core_services: We provide comprehensive financial services with focuses on: travel, hospitality, leisure, wellness and sustainability.

founder.title: Reflection of the Founder
founder.p1: How much would AI replace the work of investment bankers?
founder.p2: What would fundamentally distinguish the work of investment bankers and real estate brokers?
founder.p3: How to build an investment bank that thrives in the future, against automation and information transparency?
founder.p4: As a serial entrepreneur and investor in the global tourism market for more than a decade, I am trying to give investment banking a new form, which I named it “ecosystem investment bank”. This is a boutique investment bank which is deeply rooted in a certain industry and creates values for the entire industry ecosystem and its key stake holders, rather than just focusing on M&A transactions.
founder.p5: Many years of experience in the travel, hospitality and leisure industry has enabled me to find investment targets, business partners, and strategic investors often within my own social network. Regarded as a connector between China and the rest of the world, I have been invited to discuss Asia Entry strategies, speak at international conferences, serve as a judge in start-up competitions, or mentor in incubators.
founder.p6: Being a serial entrepreneur allows me to deeply empathize with client companies. Often times in discussing strategies with management teams, I feel like one of them. I sometimes joke that “our service is investment banking plus from McKinsey consulting and BD”. A natural result of this close entanglement is a work model, combining our network and expertise in the financial market with experience and insight of the industry.
founder.p7: After several years of being a partner in two boutique investment banks across China and France, together with a few industry gurus and experienced bankers, we founded High Seas, an alternative boutique investment bank with a unique approach and interdisciplinary team. Besides typical investment bank services, we also provide services in corporate strategy, business development, and even venture building. We are not just deal makers, but also co-founders. We are not just consultants, but also entrepreneurs. We are not just investors, but also operators. We focus on two areas: happiness and sustainability, one as the driving force for life, the other as the prerequisites for a better life. We are dedicated to transforming any sector into a “nature and future-friendly mode”. Currently, our work focuses specifically on clean energy, decarbonization, green construction and circular economy.
founder.p8: The only thing that doesn’t change is change itself. A new journey begins.

core_services.banner_text: We provide comprehensive financial services with focuses on: travel, hospitality, leisure, wellness and sustainability.

investment_incubation.title: Investment & Incubation
items: Selecting best-in-kind early-to-growth stage companies to invest, together with our co-investment partners
Connect to industry resources & strategies for partnership

strategy_consulting.title: Strategy Consulting
items: Design market entry strategy, feasibility and structure
Review strategic growth options: WOFE, JV, M&A, Sales license, Franchise
Develop range of divestment options: disposal, carve-out

merger_acquisition.title: Merger & Acquisition
items: Assistance on full execution process: material preparation, sourcing & origination, negotiation, due-diligence and deal closing assistance, as well as tactical advice throughout the transaction process

company_globalization.title: Company Globalization & Expansion
items: Local partner search and JV formation

fund_raising.title: Fund Raising
items: Define financing objectives and identify sources of financing
Assistance on raising capital from funds or strategic investors

destination_strategy.title: Destination Strategic Advisory
items: Assistance on destination design & strategic planning
Destination one-stop solution advisory: product, operation, technology, distribution and marketing
Comprehensive international and domestic IP and brands development and implantation

services.title: If you are an overseas corporate (or its investor) looking for Asia expansion
services.description: We can assist in identifying suitable growth opportunities in the region for you. We can provide you with strategic growth solutions, including: greenfield investment, JV partner/investor/representation search & greater China Company set up.

services.title: If you are an overseas investment bank/FA or consulting firm
services.description: We can assist your client in identifying the most relevant M&A target (buy-side) or JV partner in Asia. We can execute a co-mandate to search for overseas financial and strategic buyers in an M&A sell-side process.

services.title: If you are an overseas Limited Partner
services.description: We can assist you in planning your capital deployment in China and even across Asia. We provide comprehensive services including investment strategy and portfolio feedback, investment agreements, fund allocation, investment due diligence, and post-investment management. Additionally, leveraging our deep understanding of the industry chain, we can match you with excellent funds and targeted investments in both the happiness and sustainable industries to meet your specific needs.

services.title: If you are an overseas investment fund
services.description: We can assist your portfolio companies for its China/Asia development through various forms: roll-up, JV partnership, co-investments and divestment. We are also open to collaborating with you on investment projects.

services.title: If you are a Chinese corporate (or its investor)
services.description: We can assist you on fund raising and M&A (buy-side and sell-side) in China and beyond. For your international expansion, we can provide strategic asset acquisition/roll-up (leveraged with bank financing, JV partner/investor search, greater China/overseas entity set up), as well as European company set up.

services.title: If you are a Chinese investment fund
services.description: We can assist in identifying overseas direct investment opportunities for you, or we can help portfolio companies' overseas development through various forms: roll-up, JV partnership, co-investments and divestment.

services.title: If you are a Chinese investment bank/FA or consulting firm
services.description: We can assist your client in identifying the most relevant M&A target (buy-side) or JV partner in Europe and beyond. We can execute a co-mandate to search for overseas strategic buyers in an M&A sell-side process.

services.title: If you are a Chinese real estate developer/investor/destination government
services.description: We can assist in creating suitable and comprehensive “content” (international IP, well-known operating brands), to help you create destination, points of interest, and services holistically combined. We can also bring you cutting-edge companies in clean energy, green building, or other technologies to help you explore new growth opportunities.

sustainable_value_chain.banner_text:
Sustainable Value Chain:
Investment, Technology, Implementation, Incubation and Expansion

list.title: Jingjini National Center of Technology Transfer
list.description: The center is a national-level platform established in collaboration with CITIC Securities Institute, the torch center of the Ministry of Science and Technology, universities & institutes, research institutes, and major innovation enterprises. Its core mission is to build an international technology trading and service platform, and to incubate more disruptive technology innovations, in fields such as new energy, new materials, advanced manufacturing, information tech, etc.

list.title: Beijing Energy Club
list.description: The Beijing Energy Club is a non-governmental, non-profit organization composed of senior professionals. It serves as a platform for the exchange of ideas among government officials, entrepreneurs, and academic and research experts for in-depth discussion on energy resources, the environment, and climate change. Its mission is to provide advice and suggestions to the government on China’s sustainable energy development, and to share the Chinese experience with other countries.

list.title: CN Innovation
list.description: CN Innovation was established in 2021 and is a decarbonization and net-zero emission innovative technology platform company with a vision to become a leading global provider of solutions in the new energy and decarbonization market. The company’s strategic shareholders include China’s largest clean energy company, China Yangtze Power, China Three Gorges, Asian Development Bank, International Energy Agency, South Pole, etc. The company has built a strong network of connections within the Asian clean energy manufacturing industry, and has established long-term and close collaboration with businesses and governments worldwide.

list.title: Guanghe New Energy
list.description: Established in September 2016, Guanghe New Energy is a renewable energy development and investment platform. The company is committed to industrialize the nanoscale junction resonance effect, which can generate electricity in a more efficient, low-energy consumption, and low-cost way, without relying on traditional photovoltaic cells. The company has two main business segments: The company has mastered the core technology and produces nanoscale junction power generation equipment such as generators and battery packs independently...

list.title: Jordan Investment Commission
list.description: The Jordan Investment Commission (JIC) is dedicated to advancing and promoting both domestic and foreign investments, and to strengthening Jordan’s local economy. JIC provides comprehensive investment services through its local teams, and by collaborating with government agencies, is responsible to issue Jordan economic citizenship.

list.title: South Pole
list.description: South Pole, a renowned sustainability and climate change consulting firm that has provided consulting services and carbon asset management for over 700 companies worldwide. In 2021, South Pole’s ‘net zero report,’ and blog post ‘Navigating the nuances of carbon neutrality vs. net-zero’ have been cited by the IPCC. It is also a board member of Climate KIC, Europe’s largest climate change public-private partnership.

list.title: Gulf Intelligence
list.description: Gulf Intelligence (GI) is a leading strategic communications and research firm for the energy sector. It aims to enhance the thought leadership profile and position of clients as they navigate the global energy transition and a journey to Net Zero. GI is headquartered in Dubai, with over 15 years of operational experience in the GCC and other regions, offering bespoke and strategic advice.

list.title: China General Certification Center
list.description: Founded in 2002, China General Certification Center (CGC) is a leading third-party technical service organization providing services like standard development, testing, inspection, certification, and technical consulting. Its business covers areas like renewable energy, climate change, industrial energy-saving and emission reduction, etc. With its professional team and extensive experience, CGC has become a well-known brand, aiming to be a global technical service leader and industry enabler.

list.title: Precast Building Network
list.description: Was established in 2011 and is affiliated with Changzhou Municipal People’s Government. It is one of the most influential and authoritative service platforms in China’s prefabrication construction. The business covers online and offline media, industry research, brand promotion, project promotion, recruitment, and training, among others. Its platform has a strong influence both domestically and internationally, encompassing regions with its nationwide network of branches and offices. As of 2022, it has secured multiple rounds of financing from renowned investment institutions and abundant resources and a global perspective. Precast network provides comprehensive services for the entire industry chain, including real estate, design, enterprises, industry organizations, and individuals.

list.title: Transblock
list.description: Is a leading Chinese manufacturer of smart assembly-type renovation products, providing one-stop solutions for the renovation of old residential communities. Through independent research and development and standardized production, Transblock has created a series of trusted intelligent assembly-type renovation enterprises, the company has a strong influence both domestically and internationally, encompassing regions with its nationwide network of branches and offices. As of 2022, it has secured multiple rounds of financing from renowned investment institutions, including ZhenFund, Source Code Capital, GGV Capital, and Meituan-Dianping Longzhu Fund.

list.title: Shanghai Senlin Building Decoration Systems Co., Ltd.
list.description: Is a comprehensive enterprise with research and development, manufacturing, project design, and installation, the company has a strong influence both domestically and internationally, encompassing regions with its nationwide network of branches and offices. As of 2022, it has secured multiple rounds of financing from renowned investment institutions and abundant resources and a global perspective. Senlin integrates lighting, HVAC, fire protection, and intelligent systems into its prefabricated building decoration, and is one of the most influential and authoritative service platforms in the Chinese prefabricated building decoration industry.

support_unit.title: Support unit

Sino-Asia International Industrialized Construction Exhibition Organizing Committee
Steel Structure Branch, China Construction Metal Structure Association
German International Cooperation Agency (GIZ)-Jiangsu Project Office

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To be a leading ecosystem investment bank, creating value for the entire industry ecosystem and its key stakeholders, rather than just focusing on M&A transactions.

about_us.banner_text:
A holistic approach and an interdisciplinary mindset are vital for business innovation,
so as for the team buildup of a new hybrid financial institution.

core_members.title: Core Members
core_members.p1: We are a group of individuals who are not only diligent and thoughtful, but also Interesting and compassionate.
core_members.p2: It is a team of diverse interests, domain knowledge, ways of thinking, and professional experiences, which is necessary to serve a people-centric industry as travel, hospitality, leisure, wellness and sustainability.
core_members.p3: Our team members are industry leaders, experienced bankers, seasoned entrepreneurs, and researchers with front-line experience at top companies in North America, Europe, and China. Proficiency in strategic planning, M&A, fundraising, leveraged financing and other financial services; expertise in cross-border, inter-sectoral, and cross-cultural professional services and deal making.

keywords.text: Key words of our company capability genes: global travel industry chain, hospitality and leisure; smart destination, wellness and eldercare, sustainable value chain, clean energy, decarbonization, green construction and circled economy, investment banking across China and Europe, strategic consulting, internet & high-tech startup, education innovation, themed entertainment, psychology and brain science.

advisors.title: Advisors & Collaborators
advisors.p1: Our network of advisors consists of top experts in the travel, hospitality, leisure, wellness and sustainability industry around the world.
advisors.p2: We have developed strategic partnerships with outstanding investment banks, consulting firms, and other professional service providers. Such partnerships enable us to provide turn-key services to our clients.
